DOC.brief_summary: Clinical trial for the comparison of long-term patency of heparin-bonded Dacron and human umbilical vein vascular prostheses in above-knee femoro-popliteal bypass surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Dacron vs Dardik for Fem-Pop Bypass
DOC.criteria: age 31 to 89 intermittent claudication ABI below 0.8 non elective surgery life expectancy below 2 yrs contraindication for anticoagulant therapy
